message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to let it go for $20,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the product, but I think $15,000 would be a fair price for me to pay. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $15,000 is too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $17,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value of the product, I believe $16,000 would be a fair compromise. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we split the difference and settle at $16,750?
Hello Alice, I'm glad we're making progress. Considering the value of the product and our previous discussions, I propose we settle at $16,500. I hope this proposal works for you.
